news.title: Umrah tour
news.content: we are announcing an umrah tour end of this year. two weeks. visiting Madina and Mecca.

news.title: Ramadhan 2023 announcement
news.content: we are pleased to announce you that the moon has been sighted in Japan and Ramadhan will start tomorrow, in shaa Allah.

news.title: Eid-al-Fitr 2023 announcement
news.content: we are pleased to announce you that the moon has not been sighted in Japan or Malaysia, therefore Eid-al-Fitr falls on the day after tomorrow.

news.title: Hajj 2023 tour
news.content: we are gathering a group to perform Hajj this year.

news.title: Eid-al-Adha 2023 announcement
news.content:
As salam aleykum wr wb,
Eid will be celebrated this Thursday, June 29th inshaa Allah.
We could get a bigger space for the prayer therefore we will have only 1 jamah prayer inshaa Allah.
The prayer will not be held at the Musala but at Yokohama City west district Center Gymnasium.
Details as follows :
Time: 29th June, 2023, 9:00 AM ( Salat starts at 9:30)
Place: 1-chōme-6-41 Okano, Nishi Ward, Yokohama,
Kanagawa 220-0073
Access: 7 minutes walk from Yokohama Station and 11 minutes from Yokohama MUSALAH
https://g.co/kgs/Q7W
Note:
1. Please do not park in on the road in front of the gymnasium building.
2. Please bring your prayer mat since there is no mat on the floor.
Eid Mubarak to all!
